title: Oh, Sweet Nicky
author: VD
content_html:
This appeared on CDAN. And while CDAN is not as reliable as /pol/, which, of course, is always right, it is just reliable enough to make this seemingly bizarre rumor a little more credible than one might otherwise assume it to be.

The hateful podcaster just gave us a look into his sexual fantasies and it sure does sound like that when he eventually leaves the public sphere, it’s unlikely that he will choose to remain a male which was very interesting considering his guest for said episode.

The thing about gatekeepers is, they’re picked out and elevated so that they can be taken down at will. This means it is only those who are sufficiently corrupt, or broken, who are chosen for the parts. See: Jordan Peterson, Ben Shapiro.

Anyhow, I’m not posting it here because I’m interested in the endless drama, I’m posting CDAN’s public prediction here for the record.

DISCUSS ON SG
